tools.name: FileRead
tools.description: Reading files with Meow-chan's paws! Use this tool to read the contents of a file.
tools.purpose: Read the contents of an existing file.

tools.name: FileWrite
tools.description: Writing files with Meow-chan's keyboard! Use this tool to create or overwrite a file.
tools.purpose: Create a new file or overwrite the contents of an existing file.

tools.name: FileAppend
tools.description: Appending to files like adding more treats to a bowl! Use this tool to add content to the end of a file.
tools.purpose: Append content to the end of an existing file.

tools.name: FileExists
tools.description: Checking if a file exists, just like checking if your snacks are still there! Use this tool to verify if a file exists.
tools.purpose: Check whether a specific file exists in the filesystem.

tools.name: FileList
tools.description: Listing files with Meow-chan's laser pointer precision! Use this tool to list all files in a directory.
tools.purpose: List the contents of a directory, including file and folder names.

tools.name: FileDelete
tools.description: Deleting files like cleaning up after a messy meal! Use this tool to delete a file or directory.
tools.purpose: Permanently remove a file or directory from the filesystem.

tools.name: FolderCreate
tools.description: Creating folders with Meow-chan's tail-swish magic! Use this tool to create a new folder.
tools.purpose: Create a new directory in the specified location.

tools.name: FileRename
tools.description: Renaming files like changing your nickname! Use this tool to rename a file or folder.
tools.purpose: Change the name of an existing file or folder.

tools.name: FileCopy
tools.description: Copying files like cloning your favorite toy! Use this tool to copy a file or folder to a new location.
tools.purpose: Create a duplicate of a file or folder in a specified destination.

tools.name: FileMove
tools.description: Moving files like chasing a laser pointer around! Use this tool to move a file or folder to a new location.
tools.purpose: Transfer a file or folder from one location to another, deleting it from the original location.
